hero.title: Korion
hero.subtitle: Agricultural Machinery
hero.slogan: Superior Quality, Minimal Loss & Absolute Safety

features.title: Precision Harvesting, Powerful Performance
features.subtitle: The KORION Story: Precision Engineering for Local Success

about.title: Engineered for Asia, World-Class Performance
about.desc1:
KORION is a Korean agricultural machinery business based in South Korea’s
largest agricultural region, dedicated to meeting the unique needs
of Asian farmers.

Our mission is simple: to help you chieve high-quality crops and less crop
loss using hyper-high quality machinery, always keeping safety in mind.

Unlike many imported European models—which are typically optimized for vast,
large, flat fields—our R&D and manufacturing processes are centered on
terrain adaptability and maneuverability specialized for Asia’s needs.

We provide tailored solutions by producing specialized tractor-mounted
harvesters and importing leading global machinery, including BVL mixers,
Fliegl spreaders, Kemper headers, and Dondi ditchers and cultivators.

KORION machinery is Korean-engineered for Asia’s fields.
We are your partner for world-class equipment optimized for local success.

contact.addressDetail: 570-69, Seobusaneopdo-ro, Jeongeup-si, Jeonbuk-do, Republic of Korea
contact.serviceDesc: Please contact Korion directly to schedule an appointment.

intro.title:
The KORION M-Series
Forage Harvesters
intro.desc1:
Our M-Series Universal Precision Forage Harvesters
are designed for row-independent harvesting,
offering exceptional efficiency, reliability,
and precision processing for crops like maize,
rice, barley, and sudan grass.
intro.desc2:
Unlike many European models optimized
for flat fields, the KORION M-Series is
specifically engineered to excel on Korea’s
uneven and hilly terrain. This design ensures
superior stability and performance wherever you operate.

6.title: Korion manufactured parts aside from the Kemper header

m-4.name: M-4
m-4.subtitle: Optimized for Efficiency
m-4.description:
The M-4 model (4 rows) is built for efficiency and performance versatility.
It is designed with Kemper headers, delivering 180–240 HP with its PTO
shaft overdrive clutch.

The M-4 provides optimized efficiency for 4-row harvesting.

Options include the Alpha version with hydraulics from the tractor
or the Beta version with a self-hydraulic pump in the harvester.

section1.title: Optimized for 4-Row Harvesting
features: Can use with a 180-240 HP tractor

m-6.name: M-6
m-6.subtitle: Precision Harvesting, Powerful Performance
m-6.description:
The M-6 model (6 rows) is built for higher capacity and wider working widths,
capable of handling rows up to 4.5 meters.
It utilizes a heavier duty gearbox and offers a power output of 240–300 HP
via its PTO shaft overdrive clutch.

The advanced chopping system features high-speed rollers and knives with
segments adjustable via a hydraulic cylinder, making it ideal for large-scale
operations requiring maximum throughput.
Options include the Alpha version with hydraulics from the tractor,
or the Beta version with a self-hydraulic pump in the harvester.

section1.title: Engineered for Higher Capacity and Wider Working Widths
features: Can use with a 240-300 HP tractor

m-350.name: M-350
m-350.subtitle: Superior Agility and Versatility
m-350.description:
The M-350 offers versatility with four drums
and a generous working width of up to 3.5 meters.
It achieves reliable and precise forage intake using
a four-drum configuration.

M-350 balances efficiency and size, making it a perfect
and affordable choice for mid-sized farms that require
versatile operation across multiple crops while benefiting
from KORION’s superior build quality.

Options include the Alpha version with hydraulics from
the tractor or the Beta version with a self-hydraulic pump
in the harvester.

section1.title: Versatility with Four Drums
features: Can use with a 180-240 HP tractor

m-2200.name: M-2200
m-2200.subtitle: Compact, Agile, Efficient
m-2200.description:
The M-2200 with two drums provides the ultimate
combination of compact agility and cost-effectiveness.
With a working width of up to 2.2 meters, this machine
excels in smaller fields or areas with limited access.

Its two-drum configuration ensures excellent
maneuverability and stability. The M-2200’s accessible
price point makes it an ideal option for farmers looking
to mechanize their operations with reliable,
Korean-engineered technology that handles the local
terrain with ease.

Options include the Alpha version with hydraulics
from the tractor or the Beta version with a self-hydraulic
pump in the harvester.

• Up to 2.2 meters
• Can use with a 120-160 HP tractor
• Alpha or Beta version

ads120.name: ADS 120
ads120.subtitle:
Large-Scale Operations
& Extreme Efficiency
ads120.description:
The ADS 120 is built for large-scale farms. It is the optimal model
for large livestock operations, providing consistent spreading and
superior performance across various terrains and field conditions,
regardless of the differing compositions of Hanwoo (Korean beef
cattle) or dairy manure.

The ADS 120 features high ground clearance and large tires, ensuring
excellent drivability on rough farm roads. Its hydraulic drawbar
suspension makes it perfectly suited for slopes and uneven access routes.

Equipped with two ultra-large vertical spreading beater shafts,
the ADS 120 guarantees uniform spreading and powerful breaking
of manure clumps. The entire unit is finished with a hot-dip
galvanized coating, ensuring long-term product quality and durability.

The ADS 120 utilizes a Push-off (hydraulic cylinder load transfer
system) function, which ensures fast and uniform manure application.
This system also guarantees significantly lower post-maintenance
costs compared to chain-based moving floor systems.

features:
Twin-axis vertical spreading shafts
& slinger unit (or slinger assembly)

Hydraulic Drawbar Suspension
- stable loading and efficient driving operation on slopes

Interchangeable rear gate allows for an easy conversion
from spreader to trailer option

ads120.landingDescription:
With a high loading capacity and strong
durability, the ADS120 offers stability in
even the toughest terrains. Its fast and
uniform spreading performance enhances
operational efficiency for large-scale farms.

ads100.name: ADS 100
ads100.subtitle:
The Optimal Combination of
Capacity and Maneuverability
ads100.description:
The ADS 100 is the industry standard, offering the optimal
combination of capacity and maneuverability.

This model is perfectly suited for large livestock operations,
providing consistent spreading and excellent performance
across diverse terrains and field conditions, delivering
superior results regardless of the differing compositions
of Hanwoo (Korean beef cattle) or dairy manure.

The ADS 100 features high ground clearance and large tires,
ensuring optimal drivability on rough farm roads, and its
hydraulic drawbar suspension makes it ideally suited for
sloped access routes.

The ADS 100 is equipped with two ultra-large vertical
spreading beater shafts, which guarantee uniform manure
distribution and powerful breaking of clumps. The machine
is finished with hot-dip galvanizing, ensuring long-term
product quality and durability.

The ADS 100 features the Push-off (hydraulic cylinder
material moving system) function, which guarantees fast
and uniform manure application while ensuring significantly
lower post-maintenance costs compared to chain-based
moving floor systems.

features: Twin-axis vertical spreading shafts & slinger unit (or slinger assembly)
Hydraulic Drawbar Suspension – maximum ride comfort

Interchangeable rear gate allows for
an easy conversion from spreader to trailer option

ads100.landingDescription:
The ADS100 is a standard choice for
mid-sized farms looking for a balance between
maneuverability and loading capacity with
reliable performance across the toughest terrain.

ads60.name: ADS 60
ads60.subtitle: Ultimate Agility for Complex Terrain
ads60.description:
Perfect for complex terrain and smaller fields.
The agile ADS 60 delivers precise material placement
and exceptional ease of handling.

Manage resources effectively and maintain soil health
without compromising spreading quality.

features: Excellent size for versatility and maneuverability

Four-axis vertical spreading shafts
that break manure into smaller pieces

ads60.landingDescription:
Thanks to its compact design, the ADS60
delivers excellent maneuverability in even
the narrowest farm roads and complex terrain.
It consistently breaks up clumps for
uniform spreading performance, enhancing
efficiency for small-scale operations.

others.name: Others
others.description: Fliegl의 다양한 농업 기계 솔루션을 만나보세요.

subProducts.name: TMK 140 Tipper
subProducts.subtitle: All-round Best Dumper
subProducts.description:
The Fliegl TMK 140 is a high-performance tandem
dumper (tipper) built for the toughest agricultural
transport tasks. With a permissible gross weight
of 14,000 kg and a loading volume of up to 20m³,
the TMK 140 offers outstanding stability, high
tipping angle, and reliable performance, ensuring
rapid and efficient material handling on your farm or worksite.

subProducts.name:
Slurry Tank Maxx Line Plus
(Maxx Line Plus Vacuum Tank)
subProducts.subtitle: Top Performance for Fertilizer Spreading
subProducts.description:
Combining quality with superior efficiency,
Fliegl’s Maxx Line Plus vacuum tank is defined
by its robust design and high value. Available in
various capacities (12,000 to 20,000 liters), its
powerful compressor and optional, centrally-mounted
Turbo Filler ensure fast and convenient suction
performance from either side.

It delivers top performance for intensive,
professional liquid manure application.

others.landingDescription:
The Fliegl dumpers and slurry tanks are
optimized for heavy-load transport and handling.
They deliver high productivity in diverse conditions.

vertical-mixer.name: Vertical Mixers
vertical-mixer.subtitle:
Reliable TMR Quality,
Tailored for Your Farm
vertical-mixer.description:
BVL V-Mix vertical mixers ensure a rapid,
homogenous Total Mixed Ration (TMR),
minimizing sorting and maximizing nutrient
uptake for peak herd performance.

Choose from the V-Mix Plus for superior
blending, the agile V-Mix Compact for tight
spaces, or the self-propelled V-Mix Drive for
complete autonomy and efficiency.

Reliable TMR quality, tailored for your farm.

features: Maximize Feed Efficiency with Uniform TMR Mixing
Choose from Plus, Compact, and Drive models to fit any farm size
A wide lineup ranging from compact-space models to fully self-propelled units
Consistent TMR quality for stable improvements in herd productivity

ditch-digger.name: Ditchers
ditch-digger.subtitle: High-Efficiency Drainage Channelers
ditch-digger.description:
Manage field water with precision. Dondi Ditchers
create perfectly formed, highly efficient drainage
channels to prevent waterlogging and soil erosion.
Built for reliability, they ensure optimal field
conditions and timely sowing, maximizing your
harvest potential.

Dondi ditchers can spread the soil up to 50m.
The ditcher can dig on the right and left sides
as well as central digging.

features: For arms option to use with excavator

ditch-digger.landingDescription:
Efficiently improves field drainage,preventing
waterlogging and minimizing soil erosion.
With precise channel formation and
fast operating performance, Dondi Ditchers
optimize overall crop growth conditions.

cultivator.name: Cultivators
cultivator.subtitle:
Enhanced Fertility,
Maximized Yields
cultivator.description:
Achieve ideal seedbed preparation and deeper
soil aeration. Dondi Cultivators effectively manage
residue and control weeds, promoting healthier soil
structure for better root development.

The Dondi cultivator features curved tines for quick
soil decompaction. Enhance your field’s fertility and
overall long-term yield.
cultivator.landingDescription:
Designed to deepen soil tillage, improve aeration,
and support strong root establishment.
Dondi Cultivators are essential for
maintaining a healthy soil structure.
